website_summaries.verdict: The Adidas Edge XT strives to become a versatile option for those who like to take to the roads. The casual shoe-construction of the facade mimics the enduring stylishness of modern sneakers while the one-piece opening employs extra seamless support that the runner can enjoy. Cushioning and steadiness are the focus of the foam-and-TPU-bar combo of the midsole unit.
pros: The modern and sneaker-like design of the Adidas Edge XT is lauded by those who appreciate trendy performance shoe-designs
The cushioning system is deemed comfortable and responsive
The grip of the outsole unit is welcomed by those who desire precise surface control
Breathability is an aspect that people are apparently getting from the upper unit of this Adidas running shoe
Several testers are happy with the non-irritating inner sleeve of the upper unit
cons: A few consumers have claimed that this shoe requires a break-in period of a few uses before the materials can fully acclimatize to the foot
Some testers believe that the toe box has a tendency to bunch the toes together uncomfortably

customer_reviews.title: Hard to get on
customer_reviews.text: Nice shoe that fit fairly true to size once I managed to get them on. The opening to these shoes is too small making it very difficult and painful getting my foot down into them. For that reason I have to return them. Sad because the price was right!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not for high arches
customer_reviews.text: I have a high arch. So getting these on is a task. Once on, they hurt my arches even after I'd taken them off. I wish this was not a problem cuz they are nice shoes. Just a word of warning to high arch people, not gonna be good.
customer_reviews.author: GrecoAmericano

customer_reviews.title: Addis’s Cross Trainer
customer_reviews.text: Well made shoe that I use for walking everyday and working out! Gives great arch and foot support. This is probably not a running shoe due to sturdiness of sole of shoe , but that’s not what I bought it for. Excellent product so far 1 months use and still sturdy yet comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: M2

customer_reviews.title: Great Sneaker
customer_reviews.text: Buy your normal size. A lot of adidas you should get a half size down but these were perfect.
customer_reviews.author: arc

customer_reviews.title: WAY TOO TIGHT AROUND THE FOOT
customer_reviews.text: Got these for cheap and I see why. They are unwearable.
customer_reviews.author: Steven foster

customer_reviews.title: I wish I had bought more than one pair
customer_reviews.text: So comfortable. I wear a size 16 it’s hard to find good comfortable shoes that aren’t super expensive
customer_reviews.author: Uncle Sawl

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these shoes for my son. The package arrived on time and the shoes fit as expected.
customer_reviews.author: kentuckytiger95

customer_reviews.title: Buy 1 size up...
customer_reviews.text: Buy one size up. I use size 11 US MEN, due to sale i bought size 12 and amazingly it fits PERFECTTTT...
customer_reviews.author: BenChanJr

customer_reviews.title: Very nice but..
customer_reviews.text: Looks good from the sides but from the top they look kinda weird
customer_reviews.author: Joshua W.

customer_reviews.title: Too Small
customer_reviews.text: These shoes woul be comfortable but the fit is awkwardly small. They are too short in length, and narrow in width but still look wide and bulky. I have a normal to narrow foot width and always wear a size 12
customer_reviews.author: Arien & Nikki

customer_reviews.title: Good Running Shoe, a bit Difficult to get on though.
customer_reviews.text: Fit is true to size, not as springy as Cloudfoam or Alphabounce series that I’ve worn previously. There is not a separate tongue, so it’s a bit of an effort to get on with my high arch. For the single 5K run 🏃🏻 they were good, no slip or movement inside the shoe 👟 and no rubbing so no blisters. 👍🏻
customer_reviews.author: Phil Bradham

customer_reviews.title: Opening too small
customer_reviews.text: Did not expect from a company like Adidas to design a shoe where the opening is too small. It is painful to put foot inside the shoe inspite of it being the right size. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hard to find on Amazon, but they are really popular in stores!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this pair from Academy because I couldn’t find them at first on Amazon but I love the shoes. They fit really well and look great!
customer_reviews.author: Logan T.

product_meta.title: adidas mens EE4162 Edge Cross Trainers
